PageDescription: Collaborate on documents within ownCloud using ONLYOFFICE Docs, an office suite from ownCloud’s official technological partner
CollaborateOnDocuments: Collaborate on documents within ownCloud using ONLYOFFICE Docs, an office suite from ownCloud’s official technological partner
EditAndCoAuthorOfficeDocuments: Edit and co-author office documents in ownCloud / ownCloud Web
DocumentsTab1Label: Create and edit text documents, spreadsheets, and presentations.
DocumentsTab2Label: Build, edit, and fill out PDF forms.
DocumentsTab3Label: Annotate and comment PDF files, highlight, underline and strikethrough text, add objects.
DocumentsTab4Label: Convert non-OOXML documents to OOXML formats.
DocumentsTab5Label: Share files with different access permissions: viewing/editing, commenting, reviewing, and filling forms.
DocumentsTab6Label: Collaborate on documents in real time, track changes, leave comments, and chat. Combine multiple documents into a single file. Restore previous versions of documents.
DocumentsTab7Label: Protect documents with passwords and watermarks. Restrict copying confidential data.
FreeAppsHeading: Access and edit your documents stored in ownCloud with <0>free desktop and mobile apps</0>
FreeAppsDesktopText: Edit and co-edit your ownCloud files in the desktop environment with <0>ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors</0> on Windows, Linux, or macOS
FreeAppsMobileText: Read and edit your ownCloud docs, sheets, and slides with ONLYOFFICE Documents mobile apps
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with ownCloud
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE app for ownCloud now from the ownCloud marketplace.
FeaturesFormats: Support for more than <0>50 file formats</0>, fully compatible with MS Office formats: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
FeaturesCoEditing: Real-time and paragraph-locking <0>co-editing</0>, review, version history, document comparison, comments & chat. Audio and video calls.
FeaturesAIHelper: A robust set of editing, formatting, and styling tools. Integrated <0>AI helper</0>.
FeaturesSecurity: <0>Enhanced security.</0> Flexible access rights and JWT. Encryption in transit. Watermarking and password protection. Open source code.
FeaturesConfiguration: <0>Easy configuration</0> from the ownCloud admin panel. Seamless integration with ready-to-use connector available on the ownCloud marketplace.
FeaturesFree: <0>Free Community version</0> and scalable Enterprise Edition. <0>Free 30-day trial.</0> Self-hosted solution and cloud version.
FeaturesPermissions: <0>Advanced sharing permissions.</0> Public sharing. Federated Cloud sharing.
FeaturesCustomization: <0>Customization</0> of the editor interface, possibility to show or hide some tabs.
HowToStartStep1: Deploy <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> on your own server or sign up for <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</2>.
HowToStartStep2: Get the integration app from the <0>ownCloud marketplace</0>.
ReadDetailedInstructions: Read detailed instructions in the <0>Help Center</0>.
PartnerHeading: Are you an ownCloud partner? How about improving your ownCloud user experience and increasing your revenue?
PartnerText: Join the ONLYOFFICE partnership program right now.
HowCzechTVReplaced: How Czech TV replaced Google Docs and MS Office with ONLYOFFICE and ownCloud

HowSWITCHIntegrated: How SWITCH integrated ONLYOFFICE into SWITCHdrive to create a complete alternative to Office 365
NeedAnAppToConnect: Need an app to connect ONLYOFFICE to your favorite web service? Or have you developed one?
